Dog Cuts

Technology Used
  • React
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • SASS
  • Socket.io
  • D3
  • Jest
  • Bcryptjs
  • JavaScript
  • Cloudinary
  • Twilio
  • PostgreSQL
  • Heroku

I created a Dating App where when you register, you select a Topic of your choosing. Then if someone swipes right on your profile before being able to contact you, they have to take a quiz based on the topic you selected. If they pass the quiz then you will receive a text message notifying you someone took your quiz and passed. You can then see their profile and message them if you want. I used socket.io for the instant messaging & Twilio for the text messaging. D3 was used for the bubble animation when selecting a topic. This is a project that I have been excited to create for a long time.
